message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the recommendation for the product. However, I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $120?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $135. This is my best price for now.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'll make one last offer. Could you consider selling the product to me for $125?
I'm not quite willing to go that low, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $140, which is as low as I can go.
